channel.description: Managing Services Services can be managed in many ways. You can manage systemd services, but Ansible also allows for management of tasks using Linux cron and at. Apart from that, you can use Ansible to manage the desired systemd target that a managed system should be started in, and it can reboot running machines. Table 14-2 gives an overview of the most significant modules for managing services. Table 14-2 Modules Related to Service Management
